Texts.Eng: It's some sort of corpse. I can't even discern what it is. Never seen anything like it. It's like a chimera of lifeforms. Terrifying to behold. I'm going to bring it to MacReady to autopsy. Maybe we can learn how it ticked.
Research notes about an incredible find.

The driller fell through the damned ice! The entire thing is lost, utterly unsalvagable without some means to block the effects of the liquid nitrogen pool. And that still doesn't help lug the thing out. We're going to need something to winch it to. However, something positive came of it...
